Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Implements a presumption of performance of duty disability for post-traumatic stress disorder in certain employees of Suffolk county
Summary: Implements a presumption of performance of duty disability for post-traumatic stress disorder in certain employees of Suffolk county.
LawCode: Add ยง605-g, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to implementing a presumption of performance of duty disability for post-traumatic stress disorder in certain employees of Suffolk county
